thread.title: Trish Zabik
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Trish Zabik

author: Trish Zabik
title: Trish Zabik
text: Want to compliment Suh and his excellent customer service. We have purchased many items from Gardner White and his knowledge and just overall help to us in locating and determining what option is best for what we are looking for is great. Never pushy but there to help when we need him.
